Articles.Content:
Hey folks,

first post here.

And i would like to introduce my first _successful_ heavy tanker:

[Game Version 0.19.1, MechJeb 2.0.7]

It delivers a complete Jumbo Tank and a lot of Monopropellant Fuel to almost any place between Mun and Kerbin.

In this shot, it is docked at the Orbital Propellant Depot i found on this forum a few days ago. (Thanks to the creator ... don't know the name yet. ;-))

It is definetely not the most beautiful build, but it works as planned and is very fuel efficient.

.craft File

Greetings from Kerbal orbit
